column5: I don't have a Ontario Regulations book on me and i would like to know some info of the creek/river fishing for salmon fishing in Oshawa. Saw somebody fishing at the local park today and am curious if people are auctually allowed to be fishing right now. Here is a picture of the area i was at.  So when can people start fishing and what time of year does it need to stop.  Thanks for any help given!!  Mike
your good till october 1st......then check ur regs
Hey Mike, bookmark THIS! Google is your friend.
Posting a pic, with directions, Bad idea
meh....everyone knows there is a river in oshawa.....   Hawk
